DataElement.preferredName: Medical Device Product Material Code OMOP CDM Device Concept Identifier
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Any physical object that is useful for prevention, diagnosis, monitoring, or treatment of disease or other conditions.:The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object._A system of numbered categories for representation of data._A foreign key that refers to a Standard Concept identifier in the Standardized Vocabularies for the Device concept.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any physical object that is useful for prevention, diagnosis, monitoring, or treatment of disease or other conditions.:The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any physical object that is useful for prevention, diagnosis, monitoring, or treatment of disease or other conditions.:The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object.

Concepts.definition: Any physical object that is useful for prevention, diagnosis, monitoring, or treatment of disease or other conditions.
The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.
The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object.

Property.preferredDefinition: A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A foreign key that refers to a Standard Concept identifier in the Standardized Vocabularies for the Device concept.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An object needed to perform a diagnostic, therapeutic or research activity.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

Concepts.definition: One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ValueDomain.origin: OMOP CDM:The Observational Medical Outcomes Partnership (OMOP) Common Data Model

DataElement.changeDescription: Based on CDMH BRIDG 5.0.2 and OMOP value set for CDM.
